achievements: Considered one of the greatest writers of short fiction in history
Plays such as The Seagull, Uncle Vanya, and Three Sisters are still performed worldwide
Known for his symphonies, especially the Symphony No. 4 'Romantic'
Influential figure in late Romantic music
Known for his roles in films such as Star Trek, Alpha Dog, and Fright Night
Posthumously received critical acclaim for his performance in the film Thoroughbreds
Played for clubs such as West Ham United and Queens Park Rangers
Represented the German national team at youth levels
